name: Dice Around
description:
Description:

You get lollipops when you roll the dice and you can add dice to the world with 60 lollipops. Get as many dice as you can!

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam 2022. 

Warning: 

The game might contain fast flashing lights or visual distortions so be careful :)

Controls:

Interact: E

Go Forward: W

Go Backwards: S

Go To Left: A

Go To Right: D
